data: {"generalSituation":"Under the influence of the northeast monsoon, it will be cold over Guangdong today and tomorrow. The weather will become fine. With the monsoon being replaced by an easterly airstream, temperatures will rise over the coast of Guangdong in the middle and latter parts of this week. The weather will become humid. The northeast monsoon is expected to affect southern China over the weekend.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260201","week":"Sunday","forecastWind":"North to northeast force 4 to 5, occasionally force 6 offshore and on high ground at first.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy. Cold with one or two rain patches and relatively low visibility in some areas in the morning.
